# Auto-generated from sample request/response captures
# Source of truth for argument types: GraphQL operation variable definitions
# Input field shapes inferred from sample variables when available

schema {
  query: Query
}

type Query {
  baseDistrictAssignments(filter: BaseDistrictAssignmentsFilter!): DistrictBaseAssignmentsType
  schools(filter: [SchoolFilter], itemsPerPage: Int, order: [SchoolFilter_order], page: Int): SchoolPageConnection
}

enum SchoolFilter_order {
  _PLACEHOLDER
}

input BaseDistrictAssignmentsFilter {
  schoolIds: [ID]
}

input SchoolFilter {
  districtId: ID
  id_list: [ID]
  name: String
}

type District {
  globalName: String
  id: ID
  state: String
}

type DistrictBaseAssignmentsType {
  collection: [DistrictBaseAssignmentType]
}

type DistrictBaseAssignmentType {
  assignType: String
  daId: ID
  districtId: ID
  endDate: String
  name: String
  schoolGradeLevels: [SchoolGradeLevels]
  startDate: String
}

type School {
  _id: ID
  city: String
  district: District
  globalName: String
  id: ID
  localName: String
  mathNationId: String
  name: String
}

type SchoolGradeLevels {
  gradeLevels: [String]
  school: School
  schoolId: ID
}

type SchoolPageConnection {
  collection: [School]
  paginationInfo: SchoolPaginationInfo
}

type SchoolPaginationInfo {
  itemsPerPage: Int
  lastPage: Int
  totalCount: Int
}
